item.title: Bio & CV
item.description: in school Phd in Statistics @Sapienza Universita` di Roma & TA for a bunch of courses out of school I live for boring documentaries, trash music, junk food & fancy ice-cream.

item.title: Blog
item.description: Together with two smarter & prettier (but equally nerd) guys, I am working on a blog. Hold on.

item.title: Research
item.description: My two main topics of interest are Quantile Regression and Topological Data Analysis – more specifically: Model-based Quantile Regression for Discrete Data Supervised Learning with Indefinite Topological Kernels Persistence Flamelets: multiscale Persistent Homology for kernel density exploration My fear of commitment makes me study other things as well.
